contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Russian district |en_name=Udorsky District |ru_name=Удорский район |loc_name1=Удора район |loc_lang1=Komi |image_map=Location of Udorsky District in Komi Republic.svg |map_caption=Location of Udorsky District in the Komi Republic |latd=63 |latm=27 |lats |longd=48 |longm=54 |longs |image_flag |flag_caption |image_coa |coa_caption |anthem |anthem_ref |holiday |holiday_ref |federal_subject=[[Komi Republic]] |federal_subject_ref=<ref name="Ref58" /> |adm_data_as_of=May 2012 |adm_ctr_type=''[[village#Russia|selo]]'' |adm_ctr_name=[[Koslan]] |adm_ctr_ref=<ref name="Ref58" /> |urban-type_settlement_of_district_significance_type=Urban-type settlement administrative territories |no_of_urban-type_settlements_of_district_significance=3 |selsoviet_type1=Administrative territories–''selos'' |no_of_selsoviets_type1=9 |selsoviet_type2=Administrative territories–settlements |no_of_selsoviets_type2=3 |no_of_urban-type_settlements=3 |no_of_rural_localities=52 |counts_ref=<ref name="Ref58" /> |mun_data_as_of=May 2012 |mun_formation1=Udorsky Municipal District |mun_formation1_ref=<ref name="Ref747" /> |mun_formation1_no_of_urban_settlements=3 |mun_formation1_no_of_rural_settlements=12 |mun_formation1_counts_ref=<ref name="Ref747" /> |mun_formation1_leader_title |mun_formation1_leader_title_ref |mun_formation1_leader_name |mun_formation1_leader_name_ref |mun_formation1_representative_body |mun_formation1_representative_body_ref |area_of_what |area_as_of |area_km2=35800 |area_km2_ref |pop_2010census=20400 |urban_pop_2010census=44.0% |rural_pop_2010census=56.0% |pop_2010_census_ref=<ref name="2010Census" /> |pop_latest |pop_latest_date |pop_latest_ref |established_date |established_date_ref |website=http://udora.info/ |website_ref |commonscat= |date=December 2009 }} '''Udorsky District''' ({{lang-ru|Удо́рский райо́н}}; {{lang-kv|Удора район}}) is an administrative district ([[raion]]), one of the [[administrative divisions of the Komi Republic|twelve]] in the [[Komi Republic]], [[Russia]].<ref name="Ref58">Law #13-RZ</ref> As a [[subdivisions of Russia#Municipal divisions|municipal division]], it is incorporated as '''Udorsky Municipal District'''.<ref name="Ref747">Law #11-RZ</ref> It is located in the west of the republic.<!-- and borders with [[ District]] in the north, [[ District]] in the east, [[ District]] in the south, and with [[ District]] in the west.--> The area of the district is {{convert|35800|km2|sp=us}}.{{citation needed|date=December 2009}} Its [[administrative center]] is the [[types of inhabited localities in Russia|rural locality]] (a ''[[village#Russia|selo]]'') of [[Koslan]].<ref name="Ref58" /> Population: {{ru-census|p2010=20,400|p2002=25,083|p1989=39,729}} The population of Koslan accounts for 11.2% of the district's total population.<ref name="2010Census" /> ==Udoria== The name '''Udoria''' in the [[Tsar#Full title of Russian Tsars|full official title of the Russian Tsars]] refers to Udora in the East of Komi, a salient into [[Arkhangelsk Oblast]] of Russia in the basin of the [[Vashka River|Vashka]] and [[Mezen River]]s. ==References== ===Notes=== {{Reflist}} ===Sources=== *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ko|adm|law}} *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|ko|mun|list}} {{Komi Republic}} {{Use mdy dates|date=July 2012}} [[Category:Districts of the Komi Republic]] __NOTOC__
